name: listore
description: store some data as a list

scripts.terser: terser dist/listore.js -o dist/listore.min.js -c && terser dist/listore.esm.js -o dist/listore.esm.min.js -c
scripts.build: prettier --write ./src && rollup -c && terser dist/listore.js -o dist/listore.min.js -c && terser dist/listore.esm.js -o dist/listore.esm.min.js -c

author: CrazyWhite
